img_above_text:
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a5/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)
Go into the lava, where you'll see the wall is glowing. This will be the first stream of lava coming from the wall you will have been near when fighting the first Flamling. Just before it, you can find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest, which becomes another fungiman you need to defeat.
img_below_text:
Continue up the stream of lava to find another Flamling and a tree to harvest for a Fire Date. Now go right, where you should see a cart just to the left. There is a green Wisp to collect right by its arm, and a chest opposite it that won't necessarily be visible to you yet. But what will be, is the Tenner guarding it.
Approach carefully and deal with the Tenner and the Flamlings that will appear as soon as you're close to the cart.

Go into the lava, where you'll see the wall is glowing. This will be the first stream of lava coming from the wall you will have been near when fighting the first Flamling. Just before it, you can find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest, which becomes another fungiman you need to defeat."
        - Following Text: "Continue up the stream of lava to find another Flamling and a tree to harvest for a Fire Date. Now go right, where you should see a cart just to the left. There is a green Wisp to collect right by its arm, and a chest opposite it that won't necessarily be visible to you yet. But what will be, is the Tenner guarding it.
Approach carefully and deal with the Tenner and the Flamlings that will appear as soon as you're close to the cart."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dark, lava-lit environment with a glowing wall on the left and a large, fiery creature resembling a cart or construct in the center. The creature is surrounded by smaller enemies, and a red circular marker highlights a specific point of interest, possibly indicating an interactable or target area. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's description of encountering a cart near a stream of lava, guarded by a Tenner and other enemies, with collectible items nearby.
